sentences.sContent: British scientist Stephen Hawking is worried that any extraterrestrial life we find is likely to be a creature out of the movie Predator – not ET.
sentences.sCn: 英国科学家史蒂芬·霍金曾担心，我们找到的任何一种地外生命都更有可能类似《掠食者》，而不像《ET外星人》那么友善。

sentences.sContent: Professor Stephen Hawking, one of the world's foremost physicists, is seriously ill and in hospital in Cambridge, Cambridge University said in a statement on Monday.
sentences.sCn: (路透社)-在周一的声明中，剑桥大学称，史蒂芬·霍金教授，世界上最顶尖的物理学家之一，因患重病而在剑桥住院。

trans.tranCn: 斯蒂芬•霍金（英国科学家）
